overview: The film tells about a teenage girl Sonya, whose mother lied for many years about the death of her father, after which she ran away from home. Mother and older sister find the girl in an old dacha, where they finally find an opportunity to speak out all the problems, resentments and fears that have been hushed up so diligently for years.

production_companies.name: Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation

title: The Edge of the Broken Moon
